attributes.action: I would like the price of fuel to be raised to encourage people to walk to save the environment because of the climate change!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want people to realise what fuel is doing to this environment. It is wasting valuable energy and causing more damage that it is worth. People need to realisle that the climate change is happening because of things like over-using cars etc. People may sit and look at this screen and think well "it isn't" going to harm me". but to correct you it will and it will affect your children also!!!
